of 60111105, . .

14 Janum‘y 1481.

The qwhylk day, master Archbald Dickeson, chaplan of 83111 Mychollis
50111100 111 83111 Α11111015 Kyrk, comperit befor 1110 1131170151 00115311 31111 1110
hayll communite gaderit in 1110 tolbnth 31 1110 110111 001111, 31111 1170111 1111111117
1110 said 11135101 Archbald proponit 31111 requirit 1110 53111 1331γο15 00115011 31111
communite 1111311115 131111 and 10110111οΠ1 11131 1)*15 next 83111 Mychellis 131111 011
1110 051 5111 of 1110 53111171] 11131 1110 53111 131111 11110111 has 111101055 111 83111 Mychellis
Wynd, 31111 brek dur and wondow opynand apon 1110 53111 wynd, with fro
150110 31111 intre vpthrow and donthrow to the Water, 111 1110 qwhylkis tho
balyeis answarit and said 11131 11100111 1115 1101101011 1050331311, 1101111111011·5
1110 balyeis 13111 1110 3011011 10 1110 1111111051, 111 1110 qwhylk 3011011 1110 1111111051
(1011110111 31111 53111 11131 11100111 11 wes 113 1110111111εο 1101 hindering nowther 11)
1110 111011 113 yit 10 83111 M ychell 11131 1110 53111 131111 myoht haf 11110105 in 83111
Myohellis Wynd, 31111 brek dur 31111 11011110 opynand 011 1110 53111 11111111, with
fre 150110 31111 111110 vpthrow 31111 down tln‘ow to 1110 11ἷ3101 ; 31111 111311 1110011-
11110111 1110 53111 balyeis 00115311 31111 001111111111110, bo 3 hayll eloction of tho
001111, 35 granttyt 10 1110 said master Archbald 1115 1101111011 31111 ask-yn frer
as 15 besor said, withowtyn ony demand or reuocacion in tyni 10 011111 ; qwhylk
ische and entre 1ο 1110 10153111 131111 35 15 befor said 5311 13111311 for 0111111131
31111 1101111 10 be gansaid nor ganstanding nowther be balyeis 00115311 1101· 00111-
munite of 1110 53111 burgh 113 11131· 511000550115 111 tyn] 10 CW1n3 31111 11131·-
apon 1110 53111 master Archbald askyt 31 the balyeis that 11131 wahl 03115 1110
010111 10 mak ane 30 111311311011, 1110 qwhylk 301 511111 be wyrtyn -in 1110

St Mis-haul‘s
w5ud.
